theorem.name: exp_inductive_clause

text.english: Inductive clause of the definition of \(\texttt{exp}\): \[ \forall n,m \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{exp}(S(n), m) = \texttt{mul}(\texttt{exp}(n, m), m) \]
text.italiano: Clausola induttiva della definizione di \(\texttt{exp}\): \[ \forall n,m \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{exp}(S(n), m) = \texttt{mul}(\texttt{exp}(n, m), m) \]

theorem.coq:
Theorem exp_inductive_clause: forall n m : nterm , exp (S n) m = mul (exp n m) m.
Proof.
reflexivity.
Qed.
